pr_title: Merge master to preview and move pnp helper to device only

timeline.message:
refactor(e2e): Remove validation of file upload notifications from e2e tests (#846)

This step in the test has never been reliable from the service side, so there is no reason to keep testing it
doc(samples): Add readme for pnp device samples (#857)

refactor(e2e): Add sdk logging to all test runs (#859)

While system.out will get very busy thanks to our tests running in parallel, Azure Devops is smart enough to allow you to view the logs for each individual test run without other test run's logs getting in the mix.

fix(iot-dev): Fix issue with ordering of queue within amqp layer (#858)

If two messages are queued, one for subscribing to twin, and one for getting a twin, and the latter is queued first, then the SDK gets stuck trying to send the get twin request repeatedly without trying to send the subscribe message first.

This change ensures that any message that is failed to send is placed at the back of the queue and that the next message stays at the front of the queue
doc(readme): Update main readme with latest LTS pointers
fix(vsts): Fix smart gate not ignoring iothub/provisioning tests when told to skip them

refactor(iot-dev): Remove unused executor service

It spawned no threads and wasn't used anywhere, so it should be removed
refactor(vsts): longer timeout for waiting on android emulator to start
docs(sample) : Move pnp helper to device

timeline.bodyText: Can you add the comment we had in the helper which was showing how the patch json should look like?
timeline.author: vinagesh

timeline.bodyText: Can you add the comments we had for this as well in the helper earlier?
timeline.author: vinagesh

timeline.message: docs(samples) : Remove service sample dependency on pnp helper
docs(samples) : Remove service sample dependency on pnp helper
